desc: Notion is a DIY smart monitoring system empowering home and property owners to be proactive in monitoring their spaces and most valued possessions. Powered by a multifunctional sensor and app, Notion monitors for opening doors and windows, sounding smoke/CO alarms, water leaks, and temperature changes.

layout.text: Upgraded features like text messages and phone calls are here with our new plan, Notion PRO. Plus, get your first 3 months of PRO free.
